com.sri.ai.expresso.api

Interface SubExpressionAddress

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SyntaxTreeBasedSubExpressionAddress

    @Beta
public interface SubExpressionAddress
    A SubExpressionAddress represents the relative position of a sub-expression within its parent expression. This can be used to replace it by a new sub-expression.
    Author:
    braz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Expression getSubExpressionOf(Expression expression)
      Returns the sub-expression of given expression with respect to this address.
      Expression replace(Expression expression, Expression newSubExpression)
      Replaces the sub-expression with this SubExpressionAddress by a given new sub-expression.
